data.text.1.microlancer.io.llc.we.us.microlan: 1. Microlancer.io, LLC ("we", "us", "Microlancer", "Microlancer.io") will not be held responsible for damage or funds lost due to use of this site. Members ("users", "accounts", "taskers", "askers", "you", "freelancer", "client") take your own risks by working with other members on this site.
data.text.2.all.funds.in.escrow.are.subject.t: 2. All funds in escrow are subject to release based on the evaluation and arbitration by Microlancer.io. The decision will be made by Microlancer.io whether the funds are sent to the freelancer, back to the client, or divided in portion thereof based on the evaluation.
data.text.3.you.do.not.post.offensive.illegal: 3. You do not post offensive, illegal, or otherwise bad content which could be deemed harassment or spam. Microlancer.io, LLC. is not responsible for the content posted on this site. Accounts may be banned at the whim of the Microlancer.io administrators.
data.text.4.upon.a.dispute.reasonable.efforts: 4. Upon a dispute, reasonable efforts should be made to allow the freelancer to complete the work.
data.text.5.all.payment.amounts.are.in.bitcoi: 5. All payment amounts are in Bitcoin and any non-Bitcoin amounts displayed are estimations subject to change based on the fluctuating value of Bitcoin.
6. Fees will be collected according to the fee schedule published on the %link page.
data.text.7.microlancer.io.llc.is.not.respons: 7. Microlancer.io, LLC. is not responsible for loss of funds held for any reason, such as an act of god, hacking, or any other situation. You should take this into account and avoid holding large amounts of funds in escrow. The escrow system is meant to help facilitate transactions. Microlancer.io is not a bank.
8. Microlancer.io, LLC. is not liable for the actions of our members or the results of using our site.
data.text.asker.accept.an.offer.with.escrow: Asker: Accept an offer with escrow
data.text.asker.accept.an.offer.without.escro: Asker: Accept an offer without escrow
data.text.by.providing.security.question.answ: By providing security question answers, we can help you recover your account in case you lose your password or lose access to your email address. If you prefer not to have your account recoverable, you can leave these blank.
data.text.by.using.this.site.you.agree.to.the: By using this site, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
Earned %amount sats (-%taskerFee sats fee) for completing the task:
data.text.generate.a.bitcoin: Generate a Bitcoin %icon %lightningLink invoice with your %walletLink and request your full balance amount (partial amounts are not supported yet) and paste your invoice below.
data.text.how.do.i.pay.a.lightning.invoice: How do I pay a Lightning invoice?
data.text.invoice.expired.reload.page: Invoice expired! Reload page to create a new invoice.
data.text.lightning.network.for.instant.priva: Accepts %icon Bitcoin over %icon1 Lightning Network for instant, private, near-zero fee transactions.
data.text.microlancer.io.is.primarily.coded: Microlancer.io is primarily coded, designed, owned, and operated by Tim (find me on Discord!).
data.text.microlancer.io.microtask.freelancin: Microlancer.io - Microtask freelancing with Bitcoin & Lightning Network
data.text.microlancer.io.was.launched.in.Octo: Microlancer.io was launched in October 2018 (originally known as "Ask for Bitcoin") by Tim, for Bitcoin enthusiasts to help make freelancing a more open and free place. Although Microlancer is designed for all types of tasks, much of the first tasks were Bitcoin or Lightning Network related. Microlancer.io is made possible by leveraging the low-fee microtransactions payment network built using Bitcoin smart contracts (Lightning Network).
data.text.of.course.much.help.in.testing.mark: Of course, much help in testing, marketing, feedback, development tips, and suggestions have been graciously received with %icon from many of the microlancers on this site! This would not be possible without them.
data.text.offered.to.do.this.task.for: %username offered to do this task for %amount
data.text.please.contact.us.via.discord.twitt: Please contact us via discord, twitter, or the support chat. We'll be happy to help answer any other questions you might have.
data.text.receive.email.notifications: Receive email notifications, such as alerts for task and offer status changes, messages from other users, and reminders.
data.text.receive.telegram.notifications: Receive Telegram notifications from the official Telegram bot @mlancerbot, such as alerts for task and offer status changes, messages from other users, and reminders. Username is required.
Scan the QR code below with Google Authenticator on your phone and enter the verification code generated. Or if your camera is not working, you can manually enter the auth key. You should save your auth key someplace safe, in case you lose your device. Otherwise, you will not be able to access your account anymore.
data.text.scan.the.qr.code.or.click: Scan the QR code or click the "Open in wallet" button.
data.text.special.thanks.to.the.bitcoin: Special thanks to the %bitcoinLink and %lightningNetworkLink developers!
data.text.tasker.complete.a.task.with.escrow: Tasker: Complete a task with escrow
data.text.tasker.complete.a.task.without.escr: Tasker: Complete a task without escrow
data.text.there.are.two.ways.to.withdraw: There are two ways to withdraw. You can either paste a lightning invoice directly, or use the LNURL-withdraw %lnurl feature if your lightning wallet supports it.
data.text.this.listing.is.boosted.by: This listing is boosted by %boost sat(s)
data.text.this.page.was.not.found: This page was not found. It may have been deleted or removed.
This service has multiple packages available!

data.text.this.task.is.private.only.visible.t: This task is private, only visible to: %names
data.text.tip.you.can.use.syntax: Tip: You can use %link syntax in your bio.
data.text.to.begin.receiving.Telegram.notific: To begin receiving Telegram notifications, send a /start message to @mlancerbot on Telegram.
data.text.turn.this.on.to.receive.instant: Turn this on to receive instant alerts for task and offer status changes, direct messages from other users. Even with this disabled, you can still view your alerts on the %icon Activity page.
data.text.two.factor.authentication.is.now: two-factor authentication is now enabled. To disable it, provide the code generated by the Authenticator app.
data.text.upon.any.payment.or.withdrawal.ligh: Upon any payment or withdrawal, Lightning Network fees collected by node operators will also apply. This can vary, but is typically less than 1 cent USD.
data.text.usd.amounts.are.approximate.due: %sup USD amounts are approximate due to fluctuating BTC exchange rates.
We collect your email for purposes of sending important notifications about your account, offers, and posts. We do NOT sell or distribute your email to anyone else.
data.text.we.do.not.collect.personal.informat: We do not collect personal information. However, any personal information you include in any post, offer, or message, may be disseminated through public access. In other words, be careful NOT to post personal information that you don't want disclosed.
data.text.we.ll.send.you.a.link.to.reset.your: We'll send you a link to reset your password.
data.text.we.may.store.cookies.in.order.to.ma: We may store cookies in order to maintain your login session, as well as specific settings you've chosen for your account. Cookies will also be used to collect analytics about visitors, page visit counts, and other metrics. Cookies will not be used for advertising purposes by Microlancer.io. Note also, the site uses Google Analytics and Tawk.to (live customer support widget). By using the site, you agree to the terms of Google Analytics and Tawk.to. If you would like to disable these through your browser, there are some tools and plugins that may help you do so.
We're here to help! Please click on the customer support chat bubble on the bottom right corner of your screen.
data.text.whoa.it.looks.like.we.hit.a.snag: Whoa - It looks like we hit a snag. Please send this URL to %link so we can fix this!
data.text.you.are.not.allowed.to.view.this.re: You are not allowed to view this resource. Please check with the owner to be sure you have permission.
data.text.you.have.an.active.offer.for.this.t: You have an %offerUrl for this task.
data.text.your.browser.is.blocking.notificati: Your browser is blocking notifications. Please allow it first (usually you can click on the padlock 🔒 icon on the website address bar).
